resources.string:
Come as you are, as you were
 As I want you to be
 As a friend, as a friend,
 As an old enemy
 Take your time, hurry up
 The choice is your,
 Don't be late, take a rest
 As a friend
 As an old memoria

 Come dowsed in mud, soaked in bleach
 As I want you to be
 As a trend, as a friend,
 As an old memoria

 And I swear
 That I don't have a gun
 No I don't have a gun
